TAB-ADVANCED.REUSE-LAST-TOKEN: Reuse last token found in previous pages (when not available in the current page)

TAB-ADVANCED-ERROR-HANDLING.CONTINUE-DOCUMENT-DELIVERY: Continue document delivery for the remaining recipients

INNER-HTML.RETRY-POLICY: By default report delivery jobs only have one attempt, that is when they fail, they are marked as a failure, and remain that way until you intervene. However, DocumentBurster allows to specify a retry policy, which is important for report delivery jobs such as transferring an email, which upon failure, may usually retry without issue.
INNER-HTML.SETS-DELAY: Sets the Delay between retries, exponentially backing off to the Max Delay and multiplying successive delays by a factor of 2

INNER-HTML.DB-ALL-CLOUD-PROVIDERS: DocumentBurster works with any SMTP email server including Microsoft Exchange Server and the below cloud email service providers.

TAB-ENABLE-DISABLE-DELIVERY.QUARANTINE-DOCUMENTS-WHICH-FAIL: Quarantine documents which fail to be delivered
TAB-ENABLE-DISABLE-DELIVERY.SEND-TO-WEB: Send documents to a Website (i.e. DocumentBurster Web, SharePoint, WordPress)
TAB-ENABLE-DISABLE-DELIVERY.UPLOAD-DOCUMENTS: Upload documents (i.e. FTP, SFTP, File Share, FTPs or HTTP/WebDAV)

TAB-GENERAL-SETTINGS.INVALID-CHARS-IN-PATHS: Following characters can't be used when naming files and directories

TAB-UPLOAD-CLOUD.FULL_CURL_POWER: Full cURL power is available here

TAB-UPLOAD-FILE-SHARE.FULL-CURL-POWER: Full cURL power is available here

INNER-HTML.USE-CASES:
Use Cases

1. Publish, archive or file reports to corporate network LAN locations
2. Publish, archive or file reports to (web) portals

For more details about cURL file:// usage please read:

1. cURL Man Page - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html
2. cURL Manual - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manual.html

TAB-UPLOAD-FTP.FULL-CURL-POWER: Full cURL power is available here

INNER-HTML.CURL-INTEGRATION:
DocumentBurster closely integrates with cURL in order to upload business reports through FTP, FTPS, SCP, SFTP, TFTP, HTTP, HTTPS, etc.

For more details about cURL usage please read:

1. cURL Man Page - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html
2. cURL Manual - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manual.html

TAB-UPLOAD-FTPS.FULL-CURL-POWER: Full cURL power is available here

INNER-HTML.CURL-INTEGRATION:
FTPS (also known as FTP-ES, FTP-SSL and FTP Secure) is an extension to the commonly used File Transfer Protocol (FTP) that adds support for the Transport Layer Security (TLS) and the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) cryptographic protocols.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FTPS

For more details about cURL FTPS usage please read:

1. cURL Man Page - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html
2. cURL Manual - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manual.html

TAB-UPLOAD-HTTP.FULL-CURL-POWER: Full cURL power is available here

INNER-HTML.CURL-INTEGRATION:
For more details about cURL HTTP/WebDAV usage please read:

1. cURL Man Page - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html
2. cURL Manual - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manual.html

TAB-UPLOAD-SFTP.FULL-CURL-POWER: Full cURL power is available here

INNER-HTML.CURL-INTEGRATION:
The SSH File Transfer Protocol (also Secret File Transfer Protocol, Secure FTP, or SFTP) is a network protocol that provides file access, file transfer, and file management functionalities over any reliable data stream. It was designed by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) as an extension of the Secure Shell protocol (SSH) version 2.0 to provide secure file transfer capability, but is also intended to be usable with other protocols.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SSH_File_Transfer_Protocol

For more details about cURL SFTP usage please read:

1. cURL Man Page - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manpage.html
2. cURL Manual - http://curl.haxx.se/docs/manual.html

TAB-WEB-UPLOAD-DOCUMENTBURSTER.ACCEPT-FASTER-SAFER: Accept faster and safer online payments. Let employees, customers and partners receive, view and pay online your company payslips, statements and invoices.

INNER-HTML.USE-DOCUMENTBURSTER-DRUPAL: Use DocumentBurster to securely send documents to your company Drupal website.

INNER-HTML.USE-DOCUMENTBURSTER-JOOMLA: Use DocumentBurster to securely send documents to your company Joomla website.

INNER-HTML.USE-DOCUMENTBURSTER-OTHER: Use DocumentBurster to securely send documents to all the major content management system vendors.

INNER-HTML.USE-DOCUMENTBURSTER-SHAREPOINT: Use DocumentBurster to securely send documents to your company Microsoft SharePoint website.

INNER-HTML.USE-DOCUMENTBURSTER-WORDPRESS: Use DocumentBurster to securely send documents to your company WordPress website.

MODAL-CONF-TEMPLATE.ABOVE-SNIPPED: Above snipped must be present in the first page of the input PDF report
MODAL-CONF-TEMPLATE.CONFIGURATION-VALUES-SHOULD: Configuration values should be copied from the same installation of DocumentBurster
MODAL-CONF-TEMPLATE.FILE-ALREADY-EXISTS: File already exists. Choose a different name.

INNER-HTML.DEFAULT-CONFIGURATION: Default configuration used when no other configuration template is defined explicitly. Configuration file settings.xml should never be deleted.

MODAL-CONF-TEMPLATE.NAME: Name

INNER-HTML.THIS-DEFAULT-CONFIGURATION: This (default) configuration is used automatically when no other more specific configuration template is defined explicitly. Configuration file settings.xml should never be deleted.

INNER-HTML.DB-FEATURES:
• Send PDF and Excel documents by email and/or FTP, FTPs, SFTP, TFTP, shared drives, samba servers, WebDAV servers
  • Upload (publish) reports to Microsoft SharePoint or to WordPress, Drupal and Joomla web-portals and web-sites
  • Easy to integrate with existing software solutions
INNER-HTML.DB-SERVER-FEATURES1: DocumentBurster Server has all the capabilities of DocumentBurster and some additional advanced features like scheduling, capability to run as windows services and a browser based web interface which can be accessed simultaneously by multiple people.
INNER-HTML.DB-SERVER-FEATURES2:
• DocumentBurster Server runs as central report distribution server which can be used simultaneously by multiple people and/or apps from withing your organization
  • Can be started and automated as Windows Services
  • Can schedule reports distribution to be daily, weekly, every other day, third Monday of the month, etc.

INNER-HTML.DO-YOU-WORK: Do you work for a school or university? DocumentBurster software is free for schools and universities.
INNER-HTML.IN-ORDER-APPLY: In order to apply for a free license of DocumentBurster you will need to submit a case study describing the problem which DocumentBurster will solve for your school. The case study doesnâ€™t have to be exhaustive just few descriptive paragraphs will be enough.

TAB-BURST.DID-YOU-RUN-QA: Did you run Quality Assurance for the file

TAB-MERGE-BURST.MERGED-FILE-NAME-PDF-EXTENSION: Merged File Name should have .pdf extension
TAB-MERGE-BURST.NAME: Name
TAB-MERGE-BURST.SELECT-2-OR-MORE: Select 2 or more PDF files to merge

INNER-HTML.TEST-SERVER-CATCH: Test Email Server will "catch" emails locally and will not deliver the received messages. The emails can be quickly viewed and inspected locally.
INNER-HTML.VIEW-EMAILS: View Emails (Test Email Server should be started)

TAB-QUALITY-ASSURANCE.TEST-ALL-TOKENS: Test all the burst tokens which are found in the input report (emails and upload commands will only be logged)

LOG-FILES-VIEWER-ALL-TOGETHER.CLEAR-ALL-LOG-FILES: Clear all log and quarantined files
